client

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts to handle all storage and retrieval of information relating to the functioning sound loop. This allows for global manipulation of any variables related to sound, including variables exclusively used in the tuner, scale practice, and intonation checker. The class imports the javax.sound class, the LauncherUI class from the userInterface package, and several necessary classes from the TarsosDSP library.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Jonathan Novins

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) float harmonicNote
      Serves as storage for the most recently read harmonic note frequency.
      (package private) int nearestIndex
      Serves as a variable that will hold the nearest index based on the currently read frequency.
      (package private) float noteFreq
      Serves as storage for the most recently read frequency in hz from the TarsosDSP PitchDetectionResult
      (package private) float noteProb
      Serves as storage for the probability of the most recently read frequency based on how much the loudest sound stands out from its surroundings
      (package private) float openNote
      Serves as storage for the most recently read open note frequency.
      (package private) int soundRun
      Serves as an int toggle relating to whether or notthe sound loop should be running at a given moment.
      (package private) int stringStatus1
      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the first string that the user tests.
      (package private) int stringStatus2
      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the second string that the user tests.

      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the third string that the user tests.

      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the fourth string that the user tests.

      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the fifth string that the user tests.
      (package private) int stringStatus6
      Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the sixth string that the user tests.

    • Field Detail

      • harmonicNote

        float harmonicNote
        Serves as storage for the most recently read harmonic note frequency. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool in conjunction with the openNote value

      • nearestIndex

        int nearestIndex
        Serves as a variable that will hold the nearest index based on the currently read frequency. Designed for use in conjunction with the noteFreqArray and noteArray arrays from the LauncherUI class.

      • noteFreq

        float noteFreq
        Serves as storage for the most recently read frequency in hz from the TarsosDSP PitchDetectionResult

      • noteProb

        float noteProb
        Serves as storage for the probability of the most recently read frequency based on how much the loudest sound stands out from its surroundings

      • openNote

        float openNote
        Serves as storage for the most recently read open note frequency. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • soundRun

        int soundRun
        Serves as an int toggle relating to whether or notthe sound loop should be running at a given moment. This value should be set to 1 for open microphone simulation or 0 for closed microphone behavior.

      • stringStatus1

        int stringStatus1
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the first string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • stringStatus2

        int stringStatus2
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the second string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • stringStatus3

        int stringStatus3
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the third string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • stringStatus4

        int stringStatus4
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the fourth string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • stringStatus5

        int stringStatus5
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the fifth string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

      • stringStatus6

        int stringStatus6
        Serves as storage for the intonation-check status relating to the sixth string that the user tests. Intended for use within the intonation checking tool.

        public Sound()
        Constructor that will create a new Sound Object and set all values to their defaults. Sound Object will generally serve as a global access point for certain variables.

      • micConnect

        public be.tarsos.dsp.AudioDispatcher micConnect(be.tarsos.dsp.AudioDispatcher dispatcher)
        Serves to set up a microphone connection to the host system's default recording device.
        Parameters:
        dispatcher - - receives a dispatcher device from the initial microphone connection attempt in the LauncherUI class. When the dispatcher is received, it is unfinished and does not hold the required connections.
        Returns:
        The initially received AudioDispatcher Object that has since been modified to function to its fullest extend.
